plot: Tom and Jerry are in for spooks galore in this monster collection. With 20 eerie episodes plus two bonus episodes, your goody-bag will be overflowing with fun.It's a scary and terrific good time for the whole family.
title: Tom and Jerry Tricks & Treats
plot_es: Tom and Jerry are in for spooks galore in this monster collection. With 20 eerie episodes plus two bonus episodes, your goody-bag will be overflowing with fun.It's a scary and terrific good time for the whole family.
